scripts.say: Port - Near the Royal Dorms
(Some time has passed since AI returned to her original world. Since then, the waters near the port have been peaceful.)
(AI mentioned that after she returns to her world, she would post a video of some sort. I wish we could see it from this side...)
(We've been having a good time here! How have things been for you on your world, AI? You didn't accidentally pick up a scorpion while shooting your video, did you? I'm a bit worried...)
(Haah... I wish I could send this to AI somehow...)
AI... I wonder how you're doing...
Rubrubrubrub~! This little cutie over here is soooo precious~! Could you tell big sis' your name?
By the way, it seems that the random word generator made a copy of my 3D model. I only discovered this recently, so imagine how surprised I was~!
Jeez~! You should have said that earlier~!!
However, AI is back again. Ayanami is very happy, yes.
That's right! Will you be able to stay this time?
Mmhmm! I will be able to synchronize my memories with my other self in the original world, so we're the same person. There's no problem with the setting, yup!
As expected of a super intelligent A.I. I... want to know more and more about Kizuna AI's world...
It's because I'm virtual! Anything is possible!
I see, I see! So this is that obligatory "happy ending!"
I'd like to try clicking on the "Like" button.
No matter what it is, you can count on me! I'm an intelligent super A.I. after all~â™ª
From here on out, I'll continue to be in your care!

sequence: <size=51>As long as you reach out, there will come a day when our hands can connect.</size>
<size=51>The "Singularity" that begins from beyond the boundaries of Pure White...</size>
<size=51>Builds a bond between those that would never meet.</size>
<size=51>That is the reason why I was born into Pure White.</size>
<size=51>To make a promise with those who were born onto a star streaked with lanes of azur...</size>
